Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan aims to break India’s 7-0 record in the ICC ODI World Cup.
Rohit Sharma emphasizes the team’s focus on playing good cricket rather than focusing on records.
Babar Azam declares that'records are meant to be broken' and sees the match as a 'golden opportunity' to perform.
Shubman Gill is 99% available to play after recovering from dengue fever.
Pakistan might bring back Ravichandran Ashwin to the team.
Abdullah Shafique scored a century in his World Cup debut against Sri Lanka, pushing Fakhar Zaman to the bench.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Tens of thousands of ticket-holders have reached Ahmedabad from all over the world.
Local hospitals saw an influx of patients booking check-ups to stay overnight.
Indian cricket officials announced a star-studded show ahead of the match, which surprised fans.
